metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35533 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In LibRaw, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists within the"LibRaw::adobe_copy_pixel()" function (libraw\src\decoders\dng.cpp) whenreading data from the image file.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ufraw package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
darktable package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
digikam package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
